item.title: 沃达丰交易或预示着大合并阻力将减小
item.description: 沃达丰在英国的大型并购交易获得批准，对全球监管机构审查电信交易的方式产生了影响。但首先...【原文：The approval of Vodafone’s big merger deal in the UK has implications for the way global regulators are looking at telecom deals. But first...】

item.title: 中国展示新工具为美国贸易战做好准备
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对世界第二大经济体征收更多关税，中国正在展示其准备使用的新贸易限制工具。【原文：China is showcasing new trade-restricting tools it’s prepared to use should Donald Trump carry out his threat to slap more tariffs on the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国最大的 "一带一路 "仍通向美国和友邦
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们将探讨中国对富裕世界的贸易依赖的持久性。 请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 沃尔玛衰退信号对股票的启示
item.description: 华尔街的繁荣景象无处不在（看看 SpaceX 公司 3500 亿美元的估值），看看逆向指标及其对市场的启示很有意思。【原文：With exuberance everywhere on Wall Street (check out the $350 billion valuation for SpaceX), it’s interesting to look at contrarian indicators and what they say about the market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚先令走强掩盖经济潜在风险
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选以来，肯尼亚货币经受住了美元汇率飙升的考验，但除非这个东非国家的经济增长复苏，否则肯尼亚货币将面临崩溃的风险。【原文：Kenya’s currency, which has weathered the surge in the dollar since Donald Trump won the US election, risks foundering unless the East African nation’s economic growth revives.】

item.title: 斯堪的纳维亚汽车销售掀起电动汽车热潮，瑞典却落在后面
item.description: 在旨在让更多零排放汽车上路的慷慨税收政策和激励措施的推动下，挪威和丹麦 11 月份的电动汽车销量超过了化石燃料汽车。【原文：Electric car sales in Norway and Denmark outpaced fossil fuel models in November, driven by generous tax policies and incentives aimed at putting more zero-emission vehicles on the roads.】

item.title: 销售下滑，现代汽车将向中国业务投入 11 亿美元
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co.）和北汽集团（BAIC Motor Corp.）计划向其在华合资企业注资 11 亿美元，以加快该公司向电动汽车的转型，并在全球最大汽车市场销量下滑的情况下促进出口。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. and BAIC Motor Corp. plan to inject $1.1 billion into their China joint venture in a bid to speed up the unit’s transition toward electric vehicles and boost exports amid falling sales in the world’s largest automobile market.】

item.title: 大学毕业生在帮助米莱赢得权力后开始反对他
item.description:
阿根廷的自由主义总统讥讽大学是知识分子和精英主义的堡垒。但政府资助的高等教育是公民的骄傲。【原文：

Argentina’s libertarian president derides universities as bastions of wokeness and elitism. But publicly funded higher education is a point of civic pride.

】

item.title: 债券投资者等待可能左右美联储选择的通胀数据
item.description: 债券交易员对周三公布的新一轮通胀数据保持高度警惕，这些数据可能决定美联储官员下周是降息还是维持利率不变。【原文：Bond traders are on high alert for a fresh dose of inflation data out on Wednesday that could determine whether Federal Reserve officials cut or hold interest rates next week.】

item.title: 华尔街大宗商品交易商将迎来前危机以来最糟糕的一年
item.description: 随着多年来利润丰厚的波动性逐渐减弱，全球最大的银行将迎来自大流行病爆发前以来商品交易最糟糕的一年。【原文：The world’s biggest banks are heading for their worst year in commodities trading since before the pandemic as years of lucrative volatility ease off.】

item.title: 中国人民币走软引发新兴市场货币波动
item.description: 新兴市场货币周三下跌，发展中国家货币指数创下一周半以来最大单日跌幅。【原文：Emerging-market currencies dropped Wednesday, with an index of developing-nation currencies heading for its steepest one-day loss in a week and a half.】

item.title: 印度央行新行长承诺保持政策稳定，同时保持灵活性
item.description: 印度新任命的央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，印度央行必须 "敏捷而警觉 "地应对全球挑战，同时保持政策的连续性。【原文：India’s newly-appointed central bank governor Sanjay Malhotra said that the institution will have to be “agile and alert” to tackle global challenges, while maintaining policy continuity.】

item.title: 阿曼将寻求与英国石油公司和壳牌石油公司谈判，以确保最新的液化天然气项目
item.description: 阿曼下一个液化天然气生产设施的未来取决于全球最大的几家能源公司的私人投资。【原文：The future of Oman’s next liquefied natural gas production facility hinges on private investments from some of the world’s biggest energy companies.】

item.title: 加纳经济加速至 2019 年以来最快速度
item.description: 加纳的经济增长在第三季度加速，达到近五年来的最快速度。【原文：Ghana’s economic growth accelerated in the third quarter to the fastest pace in almost five years.】

item.title: Adobe 结果被视为证明人工智能资质的 "决定性因素
item.description: Adobe 公司已经没有时间向投资者证明，它可以成为人工智能时代的赢家。【原文：Adobe Inc. is running out of time to show investors it can be a winner in the artificial intelligence era.】

item.title: 香港连锁健身房 Physical 收到清盘申请
item.description: 健身房连锁店 Physical Beauty & Fitness 的一家分支机构在今年早些时候关闭分店后，收到了该市一家大型商场运营商的清算申请。【原文：An arm of gym chain Physical Beauty & Fitness received a liquidation petition from a major mall operator in the city, following the shuttering of its branches earlier this year.】

item.title: 巴西备受赞誉的央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内图在任期结束时接受现实检验
item.description: 罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）在担任巴西央行行长之初，曾在抑制大流行病后的通胀飙升方面屡获殊荣，随后又早在发达经济体之前启动了宽松周期，同时还带头创建了先进的支付系统。【原文：Early in his term as Brazil’s central bank chief, Roberto Campos Neto racked up awards as he tamed a post-pandemic inflation spike and then started an easing cycle well before advanced economies, all while spearheading the creation of a cutting-edge payment system.】

item.title: 德国当日电价因风力不足和需求增加而跳涨
item.description: 由于风力发电量仍然较低，而预计电力需求增加，德国电力价格飙升。【原文：German power prices surged as wind generation remained low and projected electricity demand increased.】

item.title: 新加坡华侨银行加强对国际客户的审查
item.description: 新加坡第二大银行--华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp., Singapore’s second-largest lender, told some international clients to show proof of residence in the city state to avoid having their accounts shut, a signal of heightened scrutiny in the wake of a spate of money-laundering cases.】

item.title: 欧洲贷款银行寄希望于 M&A 的复兴来提高贷款量
item.description: 2024 年，再融资帮助提高了欧洲的贷款额度，但随着并购活动看起来终于有了起色，银行家们认为过桥融资的潮流终于要转向了。【原文：Refinancings helped bolster European loan volumes in 2024 but with mergers and acquisitions looking like they’re finally picking up, bankers believe the tide is finally turning for bridge financings.】

item.title: 中国监察机构责令特姆普公司整改退款政策
item.description: 中国最高市场监管部门传唤了点点客控股有限公司（PDD Holdings Inc.【原文：China’s top markets watchdog summoned PDD Holdings Inc. executives to order the company to fix its refunds-first policy, taking aim at a practice that a growing number of merchants argue hurts their bottom line.】

item.title: 据说日本央行认为等待下一次加息代价不大
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员认为等待加息的代价不大，但仍对下周加息持开放态度，具体取决于数据和市场发展情况。【原文：Bank of Japan officials see little cost to waiting before raising interest rates while still being open to a hike next week depending on data and market developments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国推出债务减免措施以偿还 260 亿美元贷款
item.description: 泰国公布了一套新的债务减免措施，以帮助数百万陷入还贷困境的零售借款人和小企业，这是泰国政府为解决东南亚最高家庭债务水平而采取的最新举措。【原文：Thailand unveiled a fresh set of debt-relief measures to cover millions of retail borrowers and small businesses struggling to repay loans, the latest bid by authorities to tackle the highest level of household debt in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 韩国政治动荡不安，经济面临风险
item.description: 韩国财政部长周三表示，韩国正面临更大的经济下行风险，因为韩国正努力减轻上周宣布戒严引发的动荡对其货币的影响。【原文：South Korea is facing greater downside economic risks as it tries to mitigate the impact on its currency of the turmoil triggered by last week’s martial law declaration, its finance minister said Wednesday.】

item.title: 前摩根大通交易员被控欺骗称自己被错误解雇
item.description: 一位前摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：An ex-JPMorgan Chase & Co. commodities trader sued the investment bank for unfair dismissal, alleging he was wrongly accused of spoofing cocoa trades to “appease” regulators.】

item.title: 日产汽车出了什么问题？这家日本汽车制造商如何才能生存下去？
item.description: 日产汽车公司再次陷入困境。在美国和中国的销售疲软引发巨额亏损后，日产汽车公司高层别无选择，只能裁员、削减五分之一的产能并下调年度利润预期。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. is fighting for its life, again. One of Japan’s flagship brands is on the brink after weak sales in the US and China triggered huge losses that left top brass with little choice but to cut jobs, slash a fifth of the carmaker’s manufacturing capacity and lower its annual profit forecast.】

item.title: 据说 SK 集团正在探索出售越南 Imexpharm 公司的大部分股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，SK 集团正在考虑出售其持有的 Imexpharm Pharmaceutical JSC 公司 65% 的股份。【原文：SK Group is considering selling its 65% stake in Imexpharm Pharmaceutical JSC, people with knowledge of the matter said, after the Vietnamese drug and medical product maker’s shares soared this year.】

item.title: EDF 提高法国 2024 年核电生产目标
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）提高了今年法国核电产出的目标，理由是在管理核电厂停机维护以及检查和维修破裂管道方面取得了进展。【原文：Electricite de France SA raised a target for French nuclear output this year, citing progress in managing plant maintenance outages, as well as checks and repairs of cracked pipes.】

item.title: 电动汽车出口受挫，中国汽车集团寻求延长补贴期限
item.description: 中国最大的汽车制造商行业组织敦促政府扩大对旧车交易的优惠，这是在电动汽车出口下降的情况下刺激国内汽车销量的措施之一。【原文：China’s biggest industry group for automobile makers urged the government to extend concessions for trading in older vehicles, as part of measures to spur domestic car sales amid a drop in electric vehicle exports.】

item.title: 豪瑟表示，澳大利亚央行将保持警惕，随时准备对特朗普关税做出反应
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）周三表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的关税建议对澳大利亚通胀的影响 "模棱两可"，因为可变因素很多，但储备银行将保持警惕，随时准备在必要时做出反应。【原文：Fallout on Australian inflation from President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs is “ambiguous” given the wide range of variables, but the Reserve Bank will be alert and ready to respond as needed, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said Wednesday.】
